index.pageSubtitle: I made this boilerplate while developing <1>my personal website</1>.
index.tsDesc: Safety and tight integration with your editor.
index.tailwindcssDesc: A rapid and utility-first CSS framework.
index.i18nextDesc: Internationalization framework for Next.js which uses <1>react-i18next</1> under the hood.
index.errorPageDesc: <1>404</1> and <3>500</3> error pages do exist as a sample.
index.cnaSamplesDesc: You can check out modified <1>Create Next App</1> welcome pages as small examples.
index.otherCareMotionDesc: Consider handling motion and color scheme preferences.
index.otherTryToUseDesc: Try to use text-direction sensitive properties.

index.pageSubtitle: I keep them for showing samples.
index.defaultDesc: CNA page that comes with initial Next.js project.
index.customDesc: CNA page that I wrote with <1>Tailwind CSS</1> as an example.

custom.documentDesc: Create Next App page with Tailwind CSS
custom.pageSubtitle: Get started by editing <1>pages/index.tsx</1> with <3>Tailwind CSS</3>, <5>next-i18next</5> and <7>TypeScript</7>.
custom.docsDesc: Find in-depth information about Next.js features and API.
custom.learnDesc: Learn about Next.js in an interactive course with quizzes!
custom.examplesDesc: Discover and deploy boilerplate example Next.js projects.
custom.deployDesc: Instantly deploy your Next.js site to a public URL with Vercel.
